channel.title: marcin-chwedczuk.github.io/
channel.description: A place where I share my thoughts about programming.

item.title: How to fix Vim freezes
item.description: When I switched from Visual Studio to using Vim I often experienced Vim freezes. This was really annoying. At the beginning I was thinking that maybe I installed too many plugins (using Vundle) or that Vim is not as good as they say.
